title: Constructing Core Concepts of Linear Algebra: Practical Applications Through Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic matrix operations and vector space concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on constructing linear algebra concepts applicable to engineering problems to enhance job relevance for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can transform given engineering problems into linear algebra models and propose solutions utilizing the concept of span.
Learners can identify spanning sets using real datasets and apply them to dimensionality reduction problems.
Learners can mathematically represent and interpret basis changes in engineering systems through matrix transformations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
